title: Build captain selection overview dashboard
description: Create a dashboard for captains to see team selection status across all divisions. Division 1 captains pick first, then Division 2 can see Division 1 selections, etc. This enables the hierarchical selection process.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows upcoming fixtures for captain's division
Shows which players have been selected by 'higher' divisions
Shows which players are available but not yet selected
Division 1 captains see all available players
Division 2+ captains see available players excluding those selected by higher divisions
Visual indicators for selection status (selected by D1, selected by D2, available, unavailable)
Real-time or near-real-time updates when selections change

query_logic: For a given week and captain's team, determine division rank
Get all players in club eligible for division
Check fixture_players for selections in higher-ranked divisions
Return availability status with selection info
htmx_usage: Use HTMX polling or SSE for real-time selection updates
hx-get with hx-trigger='every 30s' for simple polling

testing_requirements: Test Division 1 captain sees all available players
Test Division 2 captain sees D1 selections greyed out
Test Division 3 captain sees D1 and D2 selections
Verify real-time updates when other captains make selections

context.user_story: As a Division 2 captain, I want to see which players Division 1 has selected so I can choose from the remaining available players
